meaningMnemonic: When you have a "feeling" (気持ち) that is いい (that means "good" by the way), you have a <vocabulary>good feeling</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from the vocab word 気持ち, so if you know that (or the vocab words 気 and 持ち) you should be A-okay on this one. Maybe even <vocabulary>feeling good</vocabulary> about it?
